body: When importing from a previous version the background is not updated until after a restart.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Not refreshing background after import
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on July 28, 2014 19:02:21_

When importing from a previous version the background is not updated until after a restart.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=628_
